  • Running the GUI

Running the GUI

GUI is currently under development and not all features from the command line are supported. To run the GUI, you need to install nicegui using the following command:

[ ]:

pip install nicegui

Then simply run the following command on calzone directory:

[ ]:

python calzoneGUI.py
